taxa module¶

taxa module API:

  • taxon_name

Example usage:

from pytaxa import Taxa
x = Taxa()
x.taxon_name("Poa")
x.taxon_name("Poa", "ncbi")

taxa API¶

Taxa.taxon_name(name, database=None)[source]¶

Make a taxon name

Parameters:
  • name – [Array] A taxonomic name
  • database – [String] A database name
Returns:

A dict

Usage:

from pytaxa import Taxa
x = Taxa()
x.taxon_name("Poa")
x.taxon_name("Poa", "ncbi")
